column2: an A.M. Eatery////I was referred to this restaurant by a coworker of mines some years ago and when I finally tried it
column3: it automatically goes up to top five breakfast watery spots in the Houston Texas area. Huge selection of food choices in the menu
column4: great servers and a long line make sure if you come to this place you will have to wait a bit before getting seated. Worth the wait though
